author: Staff Reporter
text:
Race Course Police are on the lookout for C. Sakthi Dass of Kinathukadavu after the man accused of stabbing his lover in December 2014 had reportedly escaped from the court here on Tuesday. The police said that he escaped fearing that he would be once again be lodged in jail. It is learnt that in December that year he was arrested by the Selvapuram Police and later released on bail.

Race Course police registered a case under Section 224 of the Indian Penal Code.
title: Accused escapes from court
